title: Comment out keys override in ZWebView. Fix attachment downloading. Reorganize note editing.
message:
Comment out keys override in ZWebView. Fix attachment downloading. Reorganize note editing.

* ZWebView used to block all keys with intent to manually submit codes to JavaScript. AFAIK this entire approach is currently broken. Just make the activity responsive.
* Add more space to note by moving Edit command into menu
* Fix incorrect (?) regexp
* Fix saved from page pdf handling
* Open just downloaded attachments

title: Big commit of things on their way to 1.0.1. Much of this is debug logging
message:
Big commit of things on their way to 1.0.1. Much of this is debug logging
for the wild goose chase of why edits were failing, but there's new stuff.

 - Creator modes work
 - Item type changes disabled for now
 - New item creation (still incomplete)
 - New item syncing
 - Syncing from more activities
 - Better handling of credentials

title: - Actually use collection timestamps to detect what to sync
message:
- Actually use collection timestamps to detect what to sync
 - Set activity title for CreatorActivity
 - Change some Log.e lines to Log.d

title: Reworking syncing, especially aggressive syncing, to iterate nicely over
message:
Reworking syncing, especially aggressive syncing, to iterate nicely over
the collections needed. Also changing sync behavior when intiated from
MainActivity to get the collection list first-- that should detect any
changes that have been made.
